releaseNotes:
## What's New in 1.2.0

### Features
- Added offline guide caching for field technicians
- Implemented automatic sync when online

### Improvements
- Improved application startup performance by 40%
- Enhanced UI responsiveness
- Better error handling for network failures

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed authentication token expiration handling
- Resolved sync errors with large guides
- Fixed UI layout issues on 4K displays

### Security
- Updated cryptography libraries to latest versions
- Enhanced data encryption

changes.description: Added offline guide caching for field technicians
Updated cryptography libraries to latest versions
